greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number triangle read by rows, related to exp(x)/(cos(x)+sin(x)).
formula: Apart from signs the T(n,k) are the coefficients of the polynomials p(n, x) = 2^n*Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(n,k)*euler(k)*((x+1)/2)^(n-k). - _Peter Luschny_, Jun 08 2013
mathematica: row[n_] := row[n] = 2^n Sum[Binomial[n, k] EulerE[k] ((x+1)/2)^(n-k), {k, 0, n}];
Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 9}, {k, 0, n}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 13 2019, from Maple *)
program: (PARI) E(n) = 2^n*2^(n+1)*(subst(bernpol(n+1, x), x, 3/4) - subst(bernpol(n+1, x), x, 1/4))/(n+1); \\ A122045
row(n) = my(rp=p(n)); vector(n+1, k, k--; (-1)^(n-k)*abs(polcoeff(rp, k))); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 16 2020
xref: Row sums are A117443. First column is (-1)^n*A001586(n). Inverse of A117440.
Second column contains A161722 as subsequence.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 16 2006
